- CMD

```
seq 0 0.0001 10  | awk -v FS='' '$0 !~ /[2-9]+/ && length($0)==6'
```

- OUT

```

0.0011

- CMD

```
seq 0 0.0001 10  | awk -v FS='' '$0 !~ /[1-6|8-9]+/ && length($0)==6'
```

- OUT

```
0.0000
0.0007
0.0070
0.0077
